name: badge.toml
rawContent:
# Badge Component

[component]
id = "badge"
name = "Badge"
description = "Small status indicator"
category = "ui"

[[props]]
name = "variant"
type = "enum"
values = ["default", "primary", "secondary", "success", "warning", "error"]
default = "default"
description = "Badge color variant"

[[props]]
name = "size"
type = "enum"
values = ["sm", "md"]
default = "md"
description = "Badge size"

[[props]]
name = "children"
type = "ReactNode"
required = true
description = "Badge text"

[[variants]]
name = "Default"
props = { children = "Badge" }

[[variants]]
name = "Primary"
props = { variant = "primary", children = "Primary" }

[[variants]]
name = "Success"
props = { variant = "success", children = "Active" }

[[variants]]
name = "Warning"
props = { variant = "warning", children = "Pending" }

[[variants]]
name = "Error"
props = { variant = "error", children = "Failed" }

[[variants]]
name = "Small"
props = { size = "sm", children = "Small" }

[usage]
code = """
import { Badge } from '@prototype/components/ui/Badge'

<Badge variant="success">Active</Badge>
"""
